intent: Write an academic essay on AI's impact on employment

success_criteria.primary: Essay presents a coherent argument with evidence about AI and jobs
success_criteria.secondary: Meets academic standards: thesis, structured argument, conclusion

must_cover: Concrete examples of AI affecting employment (automation, augmentation)
Both job displacement AND job creation aspects
must_avoid: Casual tone inappropriate for academic writing

quality_rubric.thesis_clarity: Reader knows the author's position by end of intro
quality_rubric.argument_structure: Each paragraph advances the argument logically
quality_rubric.evidence_quality: Claims are supported, not just asserted
